## Registry.register() method

Registers dependencies in the specified container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
register(container: Container, ...params: unknown[]): void | Resolver;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

container


</td><td>

[Container](../fast-element.container/)


</td><td>

The container to register dependencies in.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

params


</td><td>

unknown\[\]


</td><td>

Parameters that affect the registration process.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void \| [Resolver](../fast-element.resolver/)

## Remarks

If this registry doubles as a Registration, it should return a Resolver for the registered dependency.
